tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Azerbaijan is a melting pot of cultures, blending influences from Persian, Turkish, and Russian traditions, reflected in its art, music, and cuisine.

tidbits.title: Land of Fire
tidbits.description: Azerbaijan is known as the 'Land of Fire' due to its natural gas reserves, historically giving rise to natural eternal flames like the Yanar Dag and Ateshgah Fire Temple.

tidbits.title: Oil Heritage
tidbits.description: Baku, the capital, is a juxtaposition of modern architecture and historic landmarks. It's historically significant for its oil industry and features the iconic Flame Towers.
